text: Dan Kelly (September 17, 1936 â€“ February 10, 1989) was a Canadian sportscaster. He was best known for calling games for the St. Louis Blues of the National Hockey League. He also called games for the NHL on CBS, USA, CBC, CTV and Global as well as the 1988 Winter Olympics (Ice Hockey for CTV) and the 1987 Canada Cup. Other than hockey, Kelly called games for the St. Louis Cardinals, Missouri Tigers football, CFL on CBC and the NFL on CBS. Dan Kelly was named to the Hockey Hall of Fame on October 3, 1989. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:1989 deaths Category:College football broadcasters Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Foster Hewitt Memorial Award winners Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:National Hockey League broadcasters
title: Dan Kelly (sportscaster)
